  * **Display**: Contraindicated
* **System**: `http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D`
  * **Code**:   [DE160](CodeSystem-IMMZ.D.md#IMMZ.D-DE160)
  * **Display**: Further evaluation needed
